name: Last Minute
description:
Last Minute is a first person horrorgame, made by KuSi Games. You are a streamer, who goes to different locations to record a livestream for his fans. But if he knew what creatures live there, he would never visit these places...
You can move on different maps and different locations to escape these creatures, but every map has his own way to escape. You need to be careful! One wrong turn and you are dead. And even if they are not smart, there are deadly!
